messages.messageBody:
Has anyone seen another tsuba with an upside down signature like this?

http://www.sanmei.com/Pictures/tuba/Tuba467.jpg

I don't see anything suggesting that the orientation of the guard has been flipped. Any idea of the significance?

Jim

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
